posts.content:
To be honest, I hesitate to post this one. It is certainly not an optimal build. However, I am posting it as a proof-of-concept to show it can be done, at the cost of being stuck with several pre-epic feats in epic levels, and therefore no Great DEX feats. I could make a STR-based version, basically trading AC for more damage, but I think that might be a bad trade. You would probably better off with my Wall of Blades build.
